topic.title: Dr. Seuss – The Banned Digitally Burned Books
topic.body:
ZeroNet - everyone should mirror this board. It's time to rain war upon censors.

/drsuessbannedbooks/ - Dr. Seuss – The Banned Digitally Burned Books

https://tinyurl.com/zad7xx5n

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DdPHedr5Tz55EtQWxqvsbEXPdc4uCVi9D/?:users/1H8kw4ERGwEvAsdM1oB46tK81RncwQLeoG:drsuessbannedbooks:adedfd3b-07df-42d7-bfc4-75233a675b99#adedfd3b-07df-42d7-bfc4-75233a675b99

1615341294_1H8kw4ERGwEvAsdM1oB46tK81Rncw.body:
> [bortbortbort](#comment_15_16e6K52Q1xLbhxAFrLeXvDjS5q8QhQ4eQm): my blocker says cp. no thanks

You do realize there are hundreds of ZeroNet users who NEVER find cp? Because they don't go looking for it.

This is a board. One of many on 08chan. Any of which can be mirrored INDEPENDENTLY. True, there is a risk that someone will post something objectionable even to this board....because Zeronet has no moderation. 

MANY believe that's a feature - not a defect. And they tire of prissy clearnet fools like yourself trying to bring their diseases here.

Go back to Reddit dipshit. You don't belong here.

> [deuxzaron](#comment_109_1M1U9ZvF9XJmt4oPY4TLBWHJZWDdRpXFFy): They're not banned, just no longer published. Existing copies are still out there.

For a time being bid up to ridiculous prices on Ebay - until Ebay stopped it. You do see the merit of offering his complete works for free as a means of punishing this company?

Anything posted to ZeroNet is potentially forever - especially if you break your signing key.
